cta.title: Understand your impact
cta.subtitle: Demonstrate your value and drive improvements

index.title: Easy impact reporting
index.subtitle: Attract funding and improve your service
index.seoTitle: Simple and Free Social Impact Reporting
index.description: Easily capture, monitor and report on your soft outcomes - attract funding and improve your service!

steps.title: You're only 4 steps away from demonstrating your impact
steps.subtitle: From choosing a questionnaire to reporting your impact, we keep things simple

1.title: 1. Select a questionnaire
1.description: Based on your desired outcomes, choose from our range of peer reviewed questionnaires. If none of them suit, you can always create your own questionnaire.

2.title: 2. Collect responses
2.description: Questionnaire responses can be collected in person, remotely or retrospectively. Responses are <securityLink>securely</securityLink> saved within Impactasaurus for review and analysis.

3.title: 3. Monitor progress
3.description: A beneficiary's journey can be monitored during your intervention. This allows you to tailor your services to meet their specific requirements.

4.title: 4. Report your impact
4.description: Generate reports showing the impact your organisation had on your beneficiaries. Reports can be generated covering all of your beneficiaries or just a certain <segmentLink>segment</segmentLink> (e.g. a project or a location).

testimonials.title: Inspirational organisations <heart/> Impactasaurus
testimonials.subtitle: Over 100 organisations use Impactasaurus to demonstrate their impact
testimonials.ageConcern: Impactasaurus allows us to show our clients and volunteers the difference we are making in a user friendly and visual way. It also helps us demonstrate to funders that we are worth investing in.
testimonials.bridge: Impactasaurus has made our evaluation process much easier, we now have a clear visual representation of the impact that we have throughout our services. It has transformed our evaluation work.
testimonials.cot: Impactasaurus is an easy to use tool. Both snapshot and distance travelled reports help us to direct improvements within our services. The advice provided by the Impactasaurus team is tremendously helpful and always prompt.
testimonials.crcc: Impactasaurus helps us understand the impact of our different projects. It produces fantastic visual representations that help us communicate the journey people make with our support.
testimonials.inclusion: Times are tough for everyone and competition for funding is tight, having robust evidence of impact is critical. Working with Impactasaurus has helped us demonstrate the difference our work makes.
testimonials.odyssey: Impactasaurus is an easy to use tool, and offers clear and powerful visuals to demonstrate impact. Backup and support is also first rate. Highly recommended!
testimonials.outreach: Impactasaurus is fantastic, it has provided us with an easy, accessible way of measuring the difference we are making to young people and then sharing this with Trustees, funders and supporters. Simple yet effective and so valuable.
testimonials.parr: It's simple to use and a great way to view your impact. Guaranteed to help with potential funders and the customer service is amazing. I'd recommend this tool to everyone!
testimonials.solace: Impactasaurus does exactly what we need it to and avoids complicated processes or duplication of existing systems. We can demonstrate trends by organisation, by project, or see the journey of a specific beneficiary.
testimonials.sportingForce: Impactasaurus is an easy to use piece of software, it takes seconds to input questionnaire responses. We can provide funders and trustees with visuals that are easily understood on each beneficiary or project.
testimonials.nfcc: We were hooked on how intuitive the site was and how quickly we were able to trial our first ideas. Now, Impactasaurus enables us to begin collecting evidence on a national scale, across 48 Fire and Rescue Services who work with 15,000 young people.
testimonials.breathingSpaces: We are delighted to recommend Impactasaurus to anyone who needs an easy to use, meaningful and efficient way of collecting, analysing and presenting data that demonstrates their outcomes and impact.

questionnaires.title: Questionnaires
questionnaires.subtitle: Define questions to measure your outcomes
questionnaires.description: Based on your desired outcomes, choose from our range of peer reviewed questionnaires. If none of them suit, you can always create your own questionnaire.

catalogue.title: Select from our catalogue
catalogue.main: Benefit from our catalogue of peer reviewed and validated questionnaires taken from the scientific literature. Our questionnaires are also freely available to browse at <soLink>softoutcomes.org</soLink>.

create.title: Create your own
create.main: If our catalogue of questionnaires does not suit, you can create your own questionnaire. Define your own scale questions easily with our questionnaire creator.

group.title: Group questions
group.main: Related questions can be categorised to produce higher level views of the data. Perfect for questionnaires with lots of questions.

responses.title: Responses
responses.subtitle: Collect and store your beneficiaries' responses
responses.description: Questionnaire responses can be collected in person, remotely or retrospectively. Responses are securely saved within Impactasaurus for review and analysis.

method.title: Collect responses however works for you
method.together: complete the questionnaire together with your beneficiary
method.remote: send a link for your beneficiary to complete remotely
method.data-entry: enter answers captured on paper or historically.

secure.title: Secure cloud storage
secure.main: Your beneficiaries' answers are stored <sLink>securely</sLink> in the cloud and are available from anywhere in the world.

monitor.title: Monitor
monitor.subtitle: Tailor your service to fit your beneficiary's journey
monitor.description: Your beneficiaries go through a journey with your support. Visualise their journey by collecting questionnaire responses throughout your intervention.

tailor.title: Tailor your service
tailor.main: Tailor the service you provide based on an individual's journey. As the saying goes, "If you can't measure it, you can't improve it".

pulse.title: Your organisation's pulse
pulse.main: The activity feed shows each questionnaire response as it is recorded, across your entire organisation; allowing you to monitor your service in real time.

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.subtitle: Produce visualisations to demonstrate your impact
reporting.description: Generate reports showing the impact your organisation had on your beneficiaries. Reports can be generated covering all of your beneficiaries or just a subset.

visualise.title: Visualise your impact
visualise.main: View the average distance travelled by your beneficiaries, as a result of your intervention. Download visualisations to include in your impact reports.

segment.title: Report on a subset of beneficiaries
segment.main: Generate reports for a particular project, location or demographic using tags. See the <sLink>segments</sLink> feature page for more information.

export.title: Export the report's data
export.main: The data used to produce the report can be exported to Excel for backup, verification or custom analysis.

segment.title: Segments
segment.description: Understand your impact for a specific location, project or demographic. Drive improvements by comparing the social impact of different approaches.
segment.subtitle: Analyse a subset of your beneficiaries

tags.title: Introducing tags
tags.main: Understand your impact for a specific location, project or demographic using tags. Tags are free text labels which can be used to segment your data.

tagging.title: Tag your data
tagging.main: Tags can be assigned to beneficiaries or individual questionnaire responses.

report.title: Report on a subset of beneficiaries
report.main1: Generate reports for a given set of tags. Only questionnaire responses with matching tags will be included in the report.
report.main2: Interested in knowing the impact of a particular project? Generate a report for that project's tag.

security.title: Security
security.description: The security of your data is our highest priority. We work hard to protect your data, your beneficiaries privacy and your privacy.
security.subtitle: The security of your data is our highest priority

how.title: How we protect your data
how.main: Impactasaurus is designed with multiple layers of protection across a distributed, reliable infrastructure. We encrypt data in transit and at rest to ensure it is secure. In case of disaster, we take regular backups.

benPrivacy.title: How we protect your beneficiaries privacy
benPrivacy.main: Questionnaire responses contain extremely personal information. To protect your beneficiaries, we do not store personally identifiable information about them. Instead, beneficiaries are referred to by ID only, keeping their responses anonymous to outside eyes.

charityPrivacy.title: How we protect your privacy
charityPrivacy.main: Our <ppLink>privacy policy</ppLink> clearly describes when we collect your information and the steps we take to protect it.

account.title: How we protect your account
account.main: Impactasaurus offers automatic detection of abnormal or suspicious account activity.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Hope you are sitting down...
pricing.description: Impactasaurus is free! If this changes in future, we will give at least 2 months notice. We are a non profit organisation.

header.title: Impactasaurus is free!
header.subtitle: If this changes, we will give you plenty of warning

changes.title: What happens if the situation changes?
changes.p1: If our donations dry up or our running costs dramatically increase, there is a chance we may need to charge you.
changes.p2: If we start charging for Impactasaurus, you will be given at least 2 months warning. If you decide you do not want to pay, we will help you migrate to another solution.
changes.p3: Impactasaurus is a non profit organisation, future pricing will only cover the costs of running and developing the software.

pricing.thanks: A special thanks to the following companies who provide their services for free:

running.title: How do you afford the running costs?
running.main: Impactasaurus was designed from the start to exploit cloud computing technology, as such, running costs are minimal. Donations cover these costs.

development.title: How do you afford to develop the software?
development.main: Development of the software is undertaken by volunteers who want to give back to society.

beta.title: I took part in the beta, how will future pricing apply to me?
beta.main: Organisations which took part in the beta will have free access to Impactasaurus forever, as a thanks for your invaluable feedback.

is-it-right.title: Is Impactasaurus the right tool for me?
is-it-right.if: Impactasaurus is the tool for you if:
is-it-right.1: You are interested in understanding the impact you are having on your beneficiaries
is-it-right.2: Your desired questionnaire is composed of scale questions (e.g. likert scales)
is-it-right.3: (For best results) You help beneficiaries over a period of time, and you can collect questionnaire responses before and after your intervention (or more frequently)

gdpr.title: Are you GDPR compliant?
gdpr.main: Yes, we take data privacy and security extremely seriously. For more information, see our <sLink>privacy and security feature page</sLink>, <pLink>privacy policy</pLink> and <cLink>cookie policy</cLink>.

sensitive-data.title: What sensitive data do you hold?
sensitive-data.main: Impactasaurus was designed to hold very little senstive data. For your staff, we capture email addresses and names. For your beneficiaries, we capture just an ID which should not include personally identifiable information.

segment.title: Can I produce reports for a specific demographic, project or location?
segment.main: Yes, this is possible with the use of tags. <sLink>Click here for more information</sLink>.

backing.title: Who is behind Impactasaurus?
backing.main: Impactasaurus is built by a team of volunteers. It is not backed by any companies. See more at our <aLink>about page</aLink>.

ben-id.title: How should I refer to my beneficiaries within Impactasaurus?
ben-id.1: If you have a system which stores beneficiary information (e.g. CRM), the beneficiary's ID within that system should also be used in Impactasaurus.
ben-id.2: If you don't have such a system, look for other ways you can assign IDs to your beneficiaries. As an example, many charities keep a spreadsheet with beneficiary information, the row number could be used as the beneficiary ID. Avoid using personal information which could be used to identify the individual, for example phone numbers, postcodes or names.

new-users.title: Can I add more users to my account?
new-users.main: Yes, you can add as many users to your organisation as you would like. To invite others, head to the users tab within the settings page. Here you can generate an invite link which should be given to anyone you would like to join your Impactasaurus.

white-label.title: Can I white label / brand Impactasaurus?
white-label.main: Yes, you can apply your organisation's logo and color scheme to Impactasaurus. Please contact support to set this up.

app.title: Is there a mobile app available?
app.main: No, however, the web app works well on mobile phones and tablets.

permissions.title: Can I restrict what a user can do?
permissions.1: All users within your organisation have the same permissions. This decision was made to keep the software simple and easy to use.
permissions.2: If you would like some control over user permissions, please drop us an email. If there is enough demand, we will consider adding this functionality.

export.title: Can I export my data?
export.main: Impactasaurus offers a range of export functionality within the application. You can export all the data associated with a questionnaire, an individual beneficiary or the data used in a report. When viewing a graph, look for a download icon in the control panel. To export data for a particular questionnaire, head to the settings > data page.

import.title: How do I import my historic data?
import.main: Due to the variety of data formats, we do not support this within the application currently. If you have a lot of data which needs importing, please email a sample of the data. We are happy to do one off imports from any data format as long as the data is compatible with Impactasaurus.

delete-ben.title: How can I delete a beneficiary?
delete-ben.main: To delete a beneficiary, delete all their saved records. If you have many beneficiaries to remove or they have a lot of records, drop us an email.

bulk-tag.title: How do I add or edit tags across many records?
bulk-tag.main: Currently the app allows tags to be edited for one record at a time. It can be time consuming to make sweeping changes to your tags. We are working on making this easier within the app, but until then, please email and explain how you would like your tags adjusted.

password-reset.title: I tried to reset my password but never received an email
password-reset.main: Please try checking your junk email, the password reset email often finds its way there. If the email isn't in your junk, please contact us, we would be happy to reset your password and explore why the email wasn't reaching you.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: We are here to help
support.description: We are here to help, if you have a question or need help, please get in contact
support.email: if you have a question, feature suggestion or need help, please email:

about.title: About Us
about.description: Our vision is for all organisations, benefiting society, to understand their social impact, allowing them to demonstrate their value to stakeholders and drive improvements to their services
about.subtitle: All organisations, benefiting society, should understand their social impact

origin.title: Origin
origin.intro: In 2016, <aldLink>ALD Life</aldLink> created a project on <scLink>Social Coder</scLink> requesting a custom outcome monitoring and reporting solution. ALD found that the commercial offerings were:
origin.crm: only offered to users of a specific CRM system
origin.end: It became apparent that ALD were not alone, other charities were struggling to find the right tools for their impact needs. Impactasaurus was founded in 2017 to meet this need.

vision.title: Vision
vision.end: To achieve this vision, we are creating easy to use and inexpensive software, to help small and medium size charities measure and understand their social impact.

team.title: Team
team.team: A team of volunteers help bring Impactasaurus' vision to life. From programming to marketing, many very talented people have given up their time to help. We are truly grateful for their support.
team.dan: Dan Reynolds, the founder of Impactasaurus, is new to the charity sector, having previously worked in software consultancy. By exploiting his software skills, Dan hopes to help charities help others.

signup.title: Signup
signup.subtitle: In two minutes, you will be measuring your impact

form.name: Name
form.existingOrg: If your organisation already has an account with Impactasaurus, please request an invite from your colleagues
form.legal: I agree to the <tLink>Terms of Use</tLink>, <pLink>Privacy Policy</pLink> and <cLink>Cookie Policy</cLink>

errors.mustAccept: To use Impactasaurus you must accept the terms of use and privacy policy
errors.invalidEmail: Your email does not appear to be valid
errors.passwordLength: Passwords should be at least 6 characters long
errors.emailAlreadyExists: User with email address {{email}} already exists
errors.signupFailed: Signup failed. Please refresh and try again, if that doesn't work, please drop us an email at support@impactasaurus.org
